product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light Packing Cell
long_description: This Sea to Summit Travelling Light Packing Cell provides orderly packing and easy accessibility to your clothes and accessories in your luggage. Mesh lid with D-shape zipper provides quick identification of contents and easy access. YKK(TM) zippers with Hypalon(TM) grab tabs provide reliable opening and closing. Side grab handle facilitates easy packing, unpacking and toting. Sea to Summit Travelling Packing Cell is crafted from super lightweight, strong and water-resistant Ultra-Sil(TM) nylon fabric made with durable Cordura(R) yarns.
short_description: This Sea to Summit Travelling Light Packing Cell provides orderly packing and easy accessibility to your clothes and accessories in your luggage.
